ActCanadian International Trade Tribunal Act
PrecisReappointment of PASQUALE MICHAELE SAROLI of Ottawa, Ontario, as a permanent member of the Canadian International Trade Tribunal to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective March 10, 2013.
